IsEligible.description: If {true} all requirements completed and the customer could become an agent, otherwise {false}.

RequiredNumberOfTokens.description: The number of tokens that required to become an agent.

Conditions.description: Represents a list of Conditions' names

ToDate.description: Represents End Date of the Earn Rule

CompletionCount.description: Represents how many times, Earn Rule can be completed

ApproximateAward.description: Represents a display value when percentage reward type is selected

IsApproximate.description: Indicates if the reward type is percentage or conversion rate

ImmediateReward.description: The amount of reward that will be given once the condition is completed.
